title: Electric current - carrier motion with no current

content.prompt: The current in a segment of wire is zero. Which of the following statements makes a correct claim about the motion of the charge carriers in this wire segment and provides reasoning to support the claim?

choices.label: Some or all charge carriers are moving because they have thermal energy.
Some or all charge carriers are moving because Earth exerts a gravitational force on them.
Every charge carrier is motionless because having zero current implies there is no potential difference to cause the carriers to move.
Every charge carrier is motionless because having zero current implies there is no net force to accelerate any of the carriers from rest.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
